alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Medina; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 6:59PM EDT until May 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Ashland County in north central Ohio... Northern Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 658 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lodi, or 13 miles southwest of Medina, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Medina, Rittman, Lodi, Creston, West Salem, Chippewa Lake, Seville, Westfield Center, Spencer, Gloria Glens Park, Burbank, Congress, Rowsburg, Chippewa-On-The-Lake and Briarwood Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
